1.0.4.name: connect20/Smartify_Smartify
1.0.4.description: This plugin installs and integrates the Smartify widget into your ecommerce site, which helps you to maximize the efficiency of your ad-spend

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
